cast.name: 史蒂芬·克雷默·格利克曼 Stephen Kramer Glickman

writer.name: 史蒂芬·克雷默·格利克曼 Stephen Kramer Glickman

this_title: Stephen Kramer Glickman: Voices In My Head
introduction: In an age of future technology and advanced robotic warfare, Stephen Kramer Glickman takes you down on the farm for some at home cooking and real world knowledge from a simpler time. A time we lovingly call “Pre-Covid”. In his first comedy special, Stephen Kramer Glickman lets his multiple personalities run free as we explore the recesses of his fantastical mind. This is “Voices in my Head”!
chinese_title: Stephen Kramer Glickman: Voices In My Head
